products.title: Hive Plain Cream Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure hive plain cream perfect fit pleated blind px71002. A contemporary dim-out blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal properties and increasing energy efficiency.
products.productdescription: Hiveplaincream perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hiveprivacy non-blackoutrange, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveplain" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric.

products.title: Hive Blackout Cream Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure hive blackout cream perfect fit pleated blind px72002. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal and increasing energy efficiency.
products.productdescription: Hive blackout cream perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hive blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveblackout"range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric.  Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.metadescription: Made to measure hive blackout geo oyster cream perfect fit pleated blind px78703. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal and increasing energy efficiency.

Part of their hive blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hive geoblackout" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Hive Blackout Cream Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Hive blackout cream pleated skylight blind in cream. Made to measure from 57.74 with free uk mainland delivery. This pleated skylight blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their hive blackout range is available in many beautiful colours and has a very elegant honeycomb texture. 
 
This cream skylight pleated blind will look great in any room in your home due to the neutral tone of the fabric, the perfect choice for your skylight windows.
 
 Product id: db-pls0052 fabric colour: cream material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.   Control type: pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes
